overview: Kevin is Rick's best friend. So of course he'd go to him for advice about his girlfriend, Pam, wanting to have anonymous sex with a masked man. But when Kevin not only shows up under the mask, gives Pam a creampie while he's wearing it, and, allegedly, gets her pregnant, Rick has to reconsider what kind of friend Kevin really is.
title: A Gonzo Story: Creampie Virgin
